fields.label: Does your program include systems and controls to determine the beneficial owner of each customer?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls used to determine the beneficial owner of each customer.

fields.label: Does your business collect and take reasonable measures to verify each beneficial owner's full name?
Does your business collect and take reasonable measures to verify each beneficial owner's date of birth?
Does your business collect and take reasonable measures to verify each beneficial owner's full residential address?
For individual customers, does your business assume the customer and beneficial owner are the same (unless grounds exist to consider otherwise)?
Does your business exempt customers verified under the simplified company verification procedure (Part 4.3.8) from beneficial owner requirements?
Does your business exempt customers verified under the simplified trustee verification procedure (Part 4.4.8) from beneficial owner requirements?
Does your business exempt Australian Government Entities from beneficial owner requirements?
Does your business exempt foreign listed public companies (or their majority-owned subsidiaries) from beneficial owner requirements?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine if additional information should be collected and verified about a beneficial owner?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to determine if additional information should be collected and verified.

fields.label: Does your business verify beneficial owner information using reliable and independent documentation?
fields.detail-label: Specify the reliable and independent documentation used for verification.

fields.label: Does your business verify beneficial owner information using reliable and independent electronic data?
fields.detail-label: Specify the reliable and independent electronic data sources used for verification.

fields.label: Does your business use a safe harbour procedure for beneficial owners where the ML/TF risk is medium or lower?
Does your safe harbour procedure include documentation-based verification using primary or secondary identification documents?
Does your safe harbour procedure include electronic-based verification using reliable and independent data from at least two separate sources?
For companies, does your business define a beneficial owner as an individual with 25% or more ownership or control?
For trusts, does your business define a beneficial owner as any individual who holds the power to appoint or remove trustees?
For associations or co-operatives, does your business define a beneficial owner based on 25% voting rights, property entitlement, or senior management position?

groups.title: Part 4.12: Beneficial Owners
groups.description: Requirements for identifying and verifying the individuals who ultimately own or control a customer.

groups.title: Collection and Verification
groups.description: Minimum KYC information for beneficial owners.

groups.title: Modifications and Exemptions
groups.description: Scenarios where standard beneficial ownership procedures may be modified or omitted.

groups.title: Verification Methods
groups.description: Acceptable sources for verifying beneficial owner identity.

groups.title: Safe Harbour Procedures
groups.description: Standardized verification procedures for medium or lower risk relationships.

groups.title: Beneficial Owner Definitions
groups.description: Specific criteria for determining beneficial ownership across different entity types.
